Summary Note:
The RM met Steiner Reiter Huber during a business conference in Vienna. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Having worked for over 40 years, Steiner Reiter Huber brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Steiner Reiter Huber and Melanie have been married since 1989. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Steiner received his secondary school diploma from BG/BRG Neusiedl am See in 1979.
He then attended University of Innsbruck, which he graduated in 1984.
Occupation History:
Steiner Reiter Huber is a 63 year old retired Partner from Austria.
In 1985, Steiner Reiter Huber started working as a Associate Attorney at Freshfields Bruckhaus Deringer LLP, marking the beginning of his successful career.
At Freshfields Bruckhaus Deringer LLP, he held the position of Senior Associate from 1988 to 1989, making significant contributions to the organization.
In 1990, he joined Schoenherr Rechtsanwaelte GmbH as a Partner, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 1210000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Wels, Traun and Bruck an der Mur, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In summary, Steiner has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
